CustomField.description: NICC-058600; Visible way for users in lighting experience to show if the record is locked for approval
CustomField.formula: IF( OR(ISPICKVAL( Approval_Status__c , "Pending Solution Design Approval"),ISPICKVAL( Approval_Status__c , "Pending Business Requirements Approval")) , TRUE, FALSE)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If the Approval Status is Pending Solution Design Approval or Pending Business Requirements Approval, the checkbox is checked.
CustomField.label: Record Locked For Approval
